title: Udyr and blackmarket bugged
body: Udyr cannot get the 20% cdr from {{item:3431}}, {{item:3430}}, {{item:3434}}  or the {{item:3745}}, he will only get 10% or 0% he cannot achieve the full 20% cdr these items offer

replies.body: just tested this and he is right it is  really buggy and will stuff up udyr mains rito pls fix
I only learnt this when I was trying to make a full on new item build... ruined my fun.
lol forty percent cdr must be reached!
more or less the idea lol, started puppet, because no escape, then grimoire cuz speedy and r and w scale, then the other 2 because wasn't getting my cdr and I cried cuz couldn't spam my e
